comment: Get a bit of cinnamon and fig maybe? Definitely getting some chocolate and coffee. The Port and Sherry finishes are a bit too sweet and overpowering of the finishing barrels.
Unique and interesting. As a fan of Black Butte Porter I get a lot of similar notes. Nose a bit stringent. Clear chocolate notes with some coffee. Seems best with an ice cube in my opinion.
Chocolate, toffee, and a pleasant burn.
Hot chocolate dry powder mix, barley, and ethanol on both nose and palate (less ethanol on palate).
